Format.ReportTitle: Household Population 10 Years Old and Over by Sex and Age Group

SQL.SQLRaw:
SELECT CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 10 AND 14 THEN '10-14' WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 15 AND 19 THEN '15-19' WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 20 AND 24 THEN '20-24' WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 25 AND 29 THEN '25-29' WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 30 AND 34 THEN '30-34' WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 35 AND 39 THEN '35-39' WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 40 AND 44 THEN '40-44' WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 45 AND 49 THEN '45-49' WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 50 AND 54 THEN '50-54' WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 55 AND 59 THEN '55-59' WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 60 AND 64 THEN '60-64' WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 65 AND 69 THEN '65-69' WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 70 AND 74 THEN '70-74' WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 75 AND 79 THEN '75-79' WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') >79 THEN '80 and over' END AS AGE, CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 10 AND 14 THEN SUM(CASE WHEN cap_citizen.cap_sex_id = '13' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 15 AND 19 THEN SUM(CASE WHEN cap_citizen.cap_sex_id = '13' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 20 AND 24 THEN SUM(CASE WHEN cap_citizen.cap_sex_id = '13' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 25 AND 29 THEN SUM(CASE WHEN cap_citizen.cap_sex_id = '13' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 30 AND 34 THEN SUM(CASE WHEN cap_citizen.cap_sex_id = '13' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 35 AND 39 THEN SUM(CASE WHEN cap_citizen.cap_sex_id = '13' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 40 AND 44 THEN SUM(CASE WHEN cap_citizen.cap_sex_id = '13' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 45 AND 49 THEN SUM(CASE WHEN cap_citizen.cap_sex_id = '13' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 50 AND 54 THEN SUM(CASE WHEN cap_citizen.cap_sex_id = '13' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 55 AND 59 THEN SUM(CASE WHEN cap_citizen.cap_sex_id = '13' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 60 AND 64 THEN SUM(CASE WHEN cap_citizen.cap_sex_id = '13' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 65 AND 69 THEN SUM(CASE WHEN cap_citizen.cap_sex_id = '13' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 70 AND 74 THEN SUM(CASE WHEN cap_citizen.cap_sex_id = '13' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 75 AND 79 THEN SUM(CASE WHEN cap_citizen.cap_sex_id = '13' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') >79 THEN SUM(CASE WHEN cap_citizen.cap_sex_id = '13' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) END AS MALE, CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 10 AND 14 THEN SUM(CASE WHEN cap_citizen.cap_sex_id = '12' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 15 AND 19 THEN SUM(CASE WHEN cap_citizen.cap_sex_id = '12' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 20 AND 24 THEN SUM(CASE WHEN cap_citizen.cap_sex_id = '12' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 25 AND 29 THEN SUM(CASE WHEN cap_citizen.cap_sex_id = '12' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 30 AND 34 THEN SUM(CASE WHEN cap_citizen.cap_sex_id = '12' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 35 AND 39 THEN SUM(CASE WHEN cap_citizen.cap_sex_id = '12' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 40 AND 44 THEN SUM(CASE WHEN cap_citizen.cap_sex_id = '12' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 45 AND 49 THEN SUM(CASE WHEN cap_citizen.cap_sex_id = '12' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 50 AND 54 THEN SUM(CASE WHEN cap_citizen.cap_sex_id = '12' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 55 AND 59 THEN SUM(CASE WHEN cap_citizen.cap_sex_id = '12' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 60 AND 64 THEN SUM(CASE WHEN cap_citizen.cap_sex_id = '12' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 65 AND 69 THEN SUM(CASE WHEN cap_citizen.cap_sex_id = '12' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 70 AND 74 THEN SUM(CASE WHEN cap_citizen.cap_sex_id = '12' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 75 AND 79 THEN SUM(CASE WHEN cap_citizen.cap_sex_id = '12' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') >79 THEN SUM(CASE WHEN cap_citizen.cap_sex_id = '12' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) END AS FEMALE, CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 10 AND 200 THEN SUM(CASE WHEN cap_citizen.cap_sex_id = '13' AND cap_citizen.cap_sex_id = '12' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) END AS TOTAL_SEXES
FROM cap_citizen
GROUP BY AGE union all select 'Total', SUM(DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 10 AND 200 AND cap_citizen.cap_sex_id = '13'),SUM(DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 10 AND 200 AND cap_citizen.cap_sex_id = '12'), SUM(DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 10 AND 200)
FROM cap_citizen

QueryColumn.Name: AGE
QueryColumn.ColumnName: CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 10 AND 14 THEN '10-14' WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 15 AND 19 THEN '15-19' WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 20 AND 24 THEN '20-24' WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 25 AND 29 THEN '25-29' WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 30 AND 34 THEN '30-34' WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 35 AND 39 THEN '35-39' WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 40 AND 44 THEN '40-44' WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 45 AND 49 THEN '45-49' WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 50 AND 54 THEN '50-54' WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 55 AND 59 THEN '55-59' WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 60 AND 64 THEN '60-64' WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 65 AND 69 THEN '65-69' WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 70 AND 74 THEN '70-74' WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 75 AND 79 THEN '75-79' WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') >79 THEN '80 and over' END AS

QueryColumn.Name: MALE
QueryColumn.ColumnName: CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 10 AND 14 THEN SUM(CASE WHEN cap_citizen.cap_sex_id = '13' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 15 AND 19 THEN SUM(CASE WHEN cap_citizen.cap_sex_id = '13' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 20 AND 24 THEN SUM(CASE WHEN cap_citizen.cap_sex_id = '13' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 25 AND 29 THEN SUM(CASE WHEN cap_citizen.cap_sex_id = '13' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 30 AND 34 THEN SUM(CASE WHEN cap_citizen.cap_sex_id = '13' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 35 AND 39 THEN SUM(CASE WHEN cap_citizen.cap_sex_id = '13' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 40 AND 44 THEN SUM(CASE WHEN cap_citizen.cap_sex_id = '13' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 45 AND 49 THEN SUM(CASE WHEN cap_citizen.cap_sex_id = '13' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 50 AND 54 THEN SUM(CASE WHEN cap_citizen.cap_sex_id = '13' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 55 AND 59 THEN SUM(CASE WHEN cap_citizen.cap_sex_id = '13' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 60 AND 64 THEN SUM(CASE WHEN cap_citizen.cap_sex_id = '13' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 65 AND 69 THEN SUM(CASE WHEN cap_citizen.cap_sex_id = '13' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 70 AND 74 THEN SUM(CASE WHEN cap_citizen.cap_sex_id = '13' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 75 AND 79 THEN SUM(CASE WHEN cap_citizen.cap_sex_id = '13' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') >79 THEN SUM(CASE WHEN cap_citizen.cap_sex_id = '13' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) END AS

QueryColumn.Name: FEMALE
QueryColumn.ColumnName: CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 10 AND 14 THEN SUM(CASE WHEN cap_citizen.cap_sex_id = '12' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 15 AND 19 THEN SUM(CASE WHEN cap_citizen.cap_sex_id = '12' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 20 AND 24 THEN SUM(CASE WHEN cap_citizen.cap_sex_id = '12' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 25 AND 29 THEN SUM(CASE WHEN cap_citizen.cap_sex_id = '12' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 30 AND 34 THEN SUM(CASE WHEN cap_citizen.cap_sex_id = '12' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 35 AND 39 THEN SUM(CASE WHEN cap_citizen.cap_sex_id = '12' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 40 AND 44 THEN SUM(CASE WHEN cap_citizen.cap_sex_id = '12' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 45 AND 49 THEN SUM(CASE WHEN cap_citizen.cap_sex_id = '12' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 50 AND 54 THEN SUM(CASE WHEN cap_citizen.cap_sex_id = '12' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 55 AND 59 THEN SUM(CASE WHEN cap_citizen.cap_sex_id = '12' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 60 AND 64 THEN SUM(CASE WHEN cap_citizen.cap_sex_id = '12' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 65 AND 69 THEN SUM(CASE WHEN cap_citizen.cap_sex_id = '12' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 70 AND 74 THEN SUM(CASE WHEN cap_citizen.cap_sex_id = '12' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 75 AND 79 THEN SUM(CASE WHEN cap_citizen.cap_sex_id = '12' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') >79 THEN SUM(CASE WHEN cap_citizen.cap_sex_id = '12' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) END AS

QueryColumn.Name: TOTAL_SEXES
QueryColumn.ColumnName: CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 10 AND 200 THEN SUM(CASE WHEN cap_citizen.cap_sex_id = '13' AND cap_citizen.cap_sex_id = '12' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) END AS
